outputs.output_descr:
The project  will strengthen capacities for sustainable land management within appropriate government, private sector and civil society institutions/users groups and mainstream sustainable land management principles and practices into long-term development planning.  The outputs associated with this project are:
Output 1:  Sustainable land management into national development policies, plans and regulatory frameworks
Output 2:  Individual and institutional capacties for sustainable land management developed.
Output 3:  Capacities for knowledge managment in support of sustainable land management developed.
Output 4:  Investment planning & resource mobilization for implementation of sustainable land management elaborated.
Output 5:  Adaptive management and learning.

project_descr: PIMS 3412 LD PDF A: CAPACITY BUILDING AND MAINSTREAMING OF SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT (SLM)  IN GRENADA.
